name: ModelConfigRequest
description: Request data for an inference engine to update its model configuration

tags.name: model_id
tags.description: Some unique identifier for the model

tags.name: version
tags.description: The version number of the model

tags.name: model_uri
tags.description: The URI (could be a datariver flow-id or an HTTP URL) from where the model can be downloaded

tags.name: hardware
tags.description: The hardware to run the model on: CPU, GPU, VPU or AUTO (optional -- defaults to AUTO)

tags.name: threshold
tags.description: The threshold at which model outputs should be published (optional -- defaults to 0.50)

tags.name: reload
tags.description: A boolean indicating whether or not the model should be dynamically loaded (optional -- defaults to false)
